WEATHER FORECAST FOR 01 May 2024
Issued at 12.00 noon on 30 April 2024

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central
provinces and in Galle and Matara districts after 2.00 p.m.

S
howers  or thundershowers  may  occur  at a  few  places  in  North-western  province during  the
afternoon or night.
Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Central, Sabaragamuwa and Uva provinces
during the morning.
General public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused
by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
